verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> concerning all the Jews<WH3064> who lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> who lived<WH3427> at Migdol,<WH4024> and at Tahpanhes,<WH8471> and at Memphis,<WH5297> and in the country<WH776> of Pathros,<WH6624> saying,<WH559>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> You have seen<WH7200> all the evil<WH7451> that I have brought<WH935> on Jerusalem,<WH3389> and on all the cities<WH5892> of Judah;<WH3063> and behold,<WH3117> this day they are a desolation,<WH2723> and no man dwells therein,<WH3427>

because<WH6440> of their wickedness<WH7451> which they have committed<WH6213> to provoke me to anger,<WH3707> in that they went<WH3212> to burn incense,<WH6999> to serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> that they didn't<WH3045> know, neither they,<WH1> nor you, nor your fathers.

However I sent<WH7971> to you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them,<WH559> saying, Oh,<WH6213> don't do this abominable<WH8441> thing<WH1697> that I hate.<WH8130>
But they didn't<WH8085> listen, nor inclined<WH5186> their ear<WH241> to turn<WH7725> from their wickedness,<WH7451> to burn no incense<WH6999> to other<WH312> gods.<WH430>

Therefore my wrath<WH2534> and my anger<WH639> was poured forth,<WH5413> and was kindled<WH1197> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem;<WH3389> and they are wasted<WH2723> and desolate,<WH8077> as it is this day.<WH3117>

Therefore now thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Why do you commit<WH6213> great<WH1419> evil<WH7451> against your own souls,<WH5315> to cut off<WH3772> from yourselves man<WH376> and woman,<WH802> infant<WH5768> and nursing<WH3243> child out<WH8432> of the midst of Judah,<WH3063> to leave<WH3498> yourselves none remaining;<WH7611>

in that you provoke me to anger<WH3707> with the works<WH4639> of your hands,<WH3027> burning incense<WH6999> to other<WH312> gods<WH430> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> where you have gone<WH935> to live;<WH1481> that you may be cut off,<WH3772> and that you may be a curse<WH7045> and a reproach<WH2781> among all the nations<WH1471> of the earth?<WH776>

Have you forgotten<WH7911> the wickedness<WH7451> of your fathers,<WH1> and the wickedness<WH7451> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and the wickedness<WH7451> of their wives,<WH802> and your own wickedness,<WH7451> and the wickedness<WH7451> of your wives<WH802> which they committed<WH6213> in the land<WH776> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem?<WH3389>

They are not humbled<WH1792> even to this day,<WH3117> neither have they feared,<WH3372> nor walked<WH1980> in my law,<WH8451> nor in my statutes,<WH2708> that I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you and before<WH6440> your fathers.<WH1>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> Behold,<WH7760> I will set my face<WH6440> against you for evil,<WH7451> even to cut off<WH3772> all Judah.<WH3063>

I will take<WH3947> the remnant<WH7611> of Judah,<WH3063> that have set<WH7760> their faces<WH6440> to go<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to live<WH1481> there,<WH8552> and they shall all be consumed; in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall they fall;<WH5307> they shall be consumed<WH8552> by the sword<WH2719> and by the famine;<WH7458> they shall die,<WH4191> from the least<WH6996> even to the greatest,<WH1419> by the sword<WH2719> and by the famine;<WH7458> and they shall be an object<WH423> of horror,<WH8047> an astonishment, and a curse,<WH7045> and a reproach.<WH2781>

For I will punish<WH6485> those who dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> as I have punished<WH6485> Jerusalem,<WH3389> by the sword,<WH2719> by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence;<WH1698>

so that none of the remnant<WH7611> of Judah,<WH3063> who have gone<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to live<WH1481> there,<WH6412> shall escape or be left,<WH8300> to return<WH7725> into the land<WH776> of Judah,<WH3063> to which they have<WH5375> a desire<WH5315> to return<WH7725> to dwell<WH3427> there:<WH7725> for none shall return save such as shall escape.<WH6405>

Then all the men<WH582> who knew<WH3045> that their wives<WH802> burned incense<WH6999> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and all the women<WH802> who stood by,<WH5975> a great<WH1419> assembly,<WH6951> even all the people<WH5971> who lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in Pathros,<WH6624> answered<WH6030> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>
As for the word<WH1697> that you have spoken<WH1696> to us in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> we will not listen to you.<WH8085>

But we will certainly<WH6213> perform<WH6213> every word<WH1697> that is gone forth<WH3318> out of our mouth,<WH6310> to burn incense<WH6999> to the queen<WH4446> of the sky,<WH8064> and to pour out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> to her,<WH6213> as we have done, we and our fathers,<WH1> our kings<WH4428> and our princes,<WH8269> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem;<WH3389> for then had we plenty<WH7646> of food,<WH3899> and were well,<WH2896> and saw<WH7200> no evil.<WH7451>

But since we left off<WH2308> burning incense<WH6999> to the queen<WH4446> of the sky,<WH8064> and pouring out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> to her,<WH2637> we have wanted all things,<WH8552> and have been consumed by the sword<WH2719> and by the famine.<WH7458>

When we burned incense<WH6999> to the queen<WH4446> of the sky,<WH8064> and poured out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> to her,<WH6213> did we make her cakes<WH3561> to worship<WH6087> her,<WH5258> and pour out drink offerings<WH5262> to her,<WH1107> without our husbands?<WH582>
Then Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> to all the people,<WH5971> to the men,<WH1397> and to the women,<WH802> even to all the people<WH5971> who had given him an answer,<WH1697> saying,<WH559>

The incense<WH7002> that you burned<WH6999> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> you and your fathers,<WH1> your kings<WH4428> and your princes,<WH8269> and the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> didn't<WH3068> Yahweh remember<WH2142> them,<WH5927> and didn't it come into his mind?<WH3820>

so that Yahweh<WH3068> could<WH3201> no longer bear,<WH5375> because<WH6440> of the evil<WH7455> of your doings,<WH4611> and because<WH6440> of the abominations<WH8441> which you have committed;<WH6213> therefore your land<WH776> has become a desolation,<WH2723> and an astonishment,<WH8047> and a curse,<WH7045> without inhabitant,<WH3427> as it is this day.<WH3117>

Because<WH6440> you have burned incense,<WH6999> and because you have sinned<WH2398> against Yahweh,<WH3068> and have not obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh,<WH3068> nor walked<WH1980> in his law,<WH8451> nor in his statutes,<WH2708> nor in his testimonies;<WH5715> therefore this evil<WH7451> has happened<WH7122> to you,<WH3117> as it is this day.

Moreover Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> to all the people,<WH5971> and to all the women,<WH802> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> all Judah<WH3063> who are in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> You and your wives<WH802> have both spoken<WH1696> with your mouths,<WH6310> and with your hands<WH3027> have fulfilled<WH4390> it,<WH559> saying, We will surely<WH6213> perform<WH6213> our vows<WH5088> that we have vowed,<WH5087> to burn incense<WH6999> to the queen<WH4446> of the sky,<WH8064> and to pour out<WH5258> drink offerings<WH5262> to her:<WH6965> establish then<WH6965> your vows,<WH5088> and<WH6213> perform<WH6213> your vows.<WH5088>

Therefore hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> all Judah<WH3063> who dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> Behold,<WH7650> I have sworn by my great<WH1419> name,<WH8034> says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> that my name<WH8034> shall no more be named<WH7121> in the mouth<WH6310> of any man<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> in all the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559> As the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> lives.<WH2416>

Behold,<WH8245> I watch over them for evil,<WH7451> and not for good;<WH2896> and all the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> who are in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall be consumed<WH8552> by the sword<WH2719> and by the famine,<WH7458> until they are all gone.<WH3615>

Those who escape<WH6412> the sword<WH2719> shall return out<WH7725> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> into the land<WH776> of Judah,<WH3063> few<WH4962> in number;<WH4557> and all the remnant<WH7611> of Judah,<WH3063> who have gone<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to live<WH1481> there,<WH3045> shall know whose word<WH1697> shall stand,<WH6965> mine, or theirs.

This shall be the sign<WH226> to you,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> that I will punish<WH6485> you in this place,<WH4725> that you may know<WH3045> that my words<WH1697> shall surely<WH6965> stand<WH6965> against you for evil:<WH7451>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> Behold,<WH5414> I will give Pharaoh Hophra<WH6548> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> into the hand<WH3027> of his enemies,<WH341> and into the hand<WH3027> of those who seek<WH1245> his life;<WH5315> as I gave<WH5414> Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> who was his enemy,<WH341> and sought<WH1245> his life.<WH5315>
